13114801852101720558 = 8974864699465338161 + 9471879374244213455

  16310091220491059541
  
  
  7061668719267090160 + 17194550569260423309 = 5809475214817961853
  
  
  =============================================
 (7061668719267090160 + 17194550569260423309) % 2**(64)
5809475214817961853

row of 1st R2 of p1 + row of 2nd R2 of P0 
=Alpha of R1 of P2
==============================================

alpha of R1 of P1 = row of 1st R2 of P0 + row of 2nd R2 of P2
13708349702397084876 = 2323274347954623420 + 11385075354442461456 
===============================================

alpha of R1 of P0 = 
row of 1st R2 of P2 + row of 2nd R2 of P1
